description:

(step1) Pump a sufficient amount of cleansing oil onto your dry hands and gently massage it all over your face to dissolve makeup and impurities.

The sensitivity hypoallergenic test has been completed with a 0.00 stimulation level, and it consists of only beneficial ingredients, excluding all 20 harmful substances. The water-like, light, and fresh formulation gently melts sebum, impurities, and makeup without clogging pores. By blending extracted natural oils, you can enjoy moist skin without any tightness even after cleansing.

reviews.title: Decent cleansing oil, but the packaging needs work
reviews.content: This cleansing oil is good at doing what it’s supposed to do, it’s on the thinner side, but removes make up and sunscreen well and emulsifies Quickly and leaves your skin feeling nice. This would be a five star review if not for the pump packaging I received. Every time I pump the bottle that this comes in, the oil seeps up from around the base of the pump mechanism. After a few uses, my bottle is pretty oily, and I have to wipe it down every so often now. I tried washing it off the first time, and I could tell that water had gotten inside because there was drops of emulsified oil inside of it. I’ll finish it, but it’s annoying to use because the packaging needs work

description:
Description


- A gentle cleansing oil that removes all traces of sun cream and heavy makeup thoroughly without causing irritation.
- Infused with five kinds of essential oil derived from nature to melt the makeup while moisturizing your delicate skin.
- It is excellent for removing heavy, oily makeup and sunscreen without irritation and stinging sensation.
- The hydrophilic oil emulsifies perfectly, gently breaking down any makeup along with impurities and sebum that are deep in the pores.

5 Natural oils:
Olive oil:
Rich in vitamin E, Olive Oil creates a barrier that keeps the skin moisturized and hydrated.
Sunflower Seed Oil:
It contains essential fatty acids and lecithin that help control the sebum production and soothe the skin.
It is a stable and mild ingredient that can be comfortably used.
Jojoba Seed Oil:
Rich in vitamins and minerals, this ingredient moisturizes skin while protecting it from environmental stressors.
It controls sebum production breaking down whiteheads and blackheads inside the pores removing not only makeup but also impurities deep under the skin.
Sweet Almond Oil:
It has a great moisturizing effect and helps to improve dry, itchy, and irritated skin.
Grape Seed Oil:
Grape Seed Oil absorbs impurities in the pores and helps clean the face.

How To Use
1. Apply a moderate amount to dry skin and gently massage onto the face in circular motions..
2. Add water to emulsify into a milky cleanser; continue to massage into the skin and rinse clean with lukewarm water.

reviews.title: Gentle and Nourishing Cleansing Oil
reviews.content: I’ve been using the AXIS-Y Biome Resetting Moringa Cleansing Oil for a few weeks now, and it has become an essential part of my skincare routine. This cleansing oil effectively removes makeup and impurities without stripping my skin of its natural moisture. Infused with moringa oil and a blend of probiotics, it not only cleanses but also nourishes the skin, leaving it feeling soft and refreshed. The lightweight formula emulsifies easily with water, making it easy to rinse off without any greasy residue. I’ve noticed an improvement in my skin’s texture and clarity since incorporating this product into my regimen. It’s suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, and I appreciate that it’s vegan and cruelty-free. Overall, I highly recommend the AXIS-Y Biome Resetting Moringa Cleansing Oil for anyone seeking a gentle yet effective cleanser.

reviews.title: One of the best oil cleansers
reviews.content: I'm pretty picky when it comes to cleansing oils, but I absolutely loved the texture of this. It is more on the oily watery side, but it emulsifies beautifully and really takes off all the spf, makeup, and grime. It doesn't leave the skin feeling dehydrated, but hydrated and soft before you go in on the second cleanse. Axis-Y really hit it out of the park with this product. I am happy to repurchase this over and over again.

description:
Description
-Gently emulsifies and removes these impurities, ensuring a clean and refreshed complexion.-Glycine Soja oil as a base for its lightweight yet potent cleansing properties, effectively removing dirt, sebum, and makeup residue.-Imparts a subtle, calming scent, transforming your skincare routine into a peaceful ritual.
-Deep cleansing : Soybean oil is used as the base ingredient to gently dissolve dirt, waste, and makeup residues that accumulate on the skin.

-Micellar cleansing technology :Micellar is a particle composed of water and oil. When it comes into contact with the skin, the oil molecules attract and absorb waste and makeup residues like a magnet, while supplying moisture deep inside the skin.

-Ginseng seed oil helps to protect the skin from external stimuli. In addition, its unique healthy and cozy grass scent helps you enjoy cleansing more comfortably.

Suggested Use

After pumping cleansing oil 1-2 times, gently massage onto a dry face.  
Then gently rinse with lukewarm water and cleanse with a foam cleanser once again.  

Key Ingredients
- Soybean oil 50% : This is a skin-friendly oil extracted from Glycine Soja consisting of oleic acid, linoleic acid, and linolenic acid. It gently dissolves wastes without clogging the skin pores and, at the same time, acts as a conditioning agent to smooth the skin.
- Ginseng seed oil 0.1% : Ginseng seed oil helps to protect the skin from external stimuli. In addition, its unique healthy and cozy grass scent helps you enjoy cleansing more comfortably.
 *due to the manufacturer change, there had been a slight change on the product ingredients and packaging.
